mapper.select:
select q.bnum,q.title,q.content,q.div,q.ref,q.level,q.step,q.del_yn,q.regdate from qna q left join member mem on mem.menum=q.menum where q.`div`=1
order by regdate desc limit #{startRow}, #{RowsinPage}

select q.bnum,q.title,q.content,q.div,q.ref,q.level,q.step,q.del_yn,q.regdate from qna q left join member mem on mem.menum=q.menum where q.`div`=2
order by regdate desc limit #{startRow}, #{RowsinPage}
select regdate from experience_info where TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute, regdate, current_date())<=-180;
select loc from experience_info where loc like '||'%'||서울||'%'||';
select * from experience_info order by price asc;
select ei.*,re.score from experience_info as ei join review as re on re.hinum=ei.hinum;

select ee.* , m.profile_img , m.id from ( select e.memnum,e.hinum , e.div_type , e.loc , e.intr , e.program , e.title , e.price , e.times , e.mater, e.people , s.subname from experience_info e inner join subDetail s on e.sunum=s.sunum) ee inner join member m on ee.memnum=m.menum where ee.hinum=#{hinum};

Select ei.einum,ei.hinum,ei.memnum,hi.img,ei.title,ei.loc,ei.times,ei.price,re.score,me.id,me.addr,me.email,me.phone,me.profile_img,me.nickname,ei.program,ei.intr,ei.mater,ei.people From experience_info ei left JOIN house_img hi ON ei.hinum = hi.hinum left JOIN review re ON ei.hinum = re.hinum left join member me on ei.memnum=me.menum where ei.hinum=#{hinum} and ei.div_type=3;
select chat_no from chat_select where menum=#{memnum} and younum=#{id};

select ee.*, h.img from ( select e.hinum , e.div_type , e.title,e.program , e.price , e.times , s.subname from experience_info e inner join subDetail s on e.sunum=s.sunum where div_type=3 or div_type=4) ee inner join house_img h on ee.hinum=h.hinum where h.ordernum=1 order by rand() limit 5

select r.* , m.profile_img , m.id ,(select sum(score)/count(*) from review where hinum=#{hinum}) totalscore from review r inner join member m on r.menum=m.menum where r.hinum=#{hinum} order by renum desc
